text: A House Divided is a logical level wargame placed in the American Civil War for two players, featuring point-to-point movement. It was designed by Frank Chadwick. It was published in 1981 by Game Designers Workshop (GDW). Games reviews said the new game was notable.Fawcett, Bill (September 1981). "The Dragon's Augury". Dragon (magazine).
